eng.name: Apple
eng.desc: Hello! I am Apple ğŸ. I may look simple, but inside me lives a little doctor. If you eat me every day, I help make your immunity stronger, improve your digestion, and keep your heart healthy. My Vitamin C and fiber keep your body fresh and full of energy, so you feel active all day. I am not just a fruit, I am your health partner. Whether in your lunchbox, as juice, in a salad, or as a sweet dish, I always add taste and goodness. Sometimes I am red, sometimes green, and sometimes yellow â€“ but in every color, I bring you love and care. Thatâ€™s why people say: â€œAn apple a day keeps the doctor away.â€
eng.fact: Did you know apples float in water because 25% of their volume is air? ğŸğŸ
